From: ' 
Subject: RE: Significant events next week? 
Date: Fri, I  I  Jan 2019 17:58:40 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Hi 
Next week, the team on our Jeffrey Epstein investigation (we can fill you in more at 3 pm) is traveling to Florida to meet 
with the case agents on the original Epstein investigation and begin the process of collecting the hard copy files from that 
investigation. 
Not a  prospective update, but today, Victor Casado, a former supervisory guard at the MCC, was sentenced to 36 months 
for his role in smuggling contraband into the MCC for   in 
exchange for tens of thousands of dollars in bribes. 
Subject: RE: Significant events next week? 
Same request. Hopefully soon I'll be in the loop enough that I  won't have to ask this, but for the time being, please bear 
with me. Thanks! 
Subject: Significant events next week? 
Just so I  have a sense, can you shoot me an email about any significant events (pleas, sentencings, hearings, significant 
meetings, etc.) that will be happening next week? I  don't need detail â€”  just a brief description of the event so it is on my 
EFTA00013436

radar screen. Thanks. 
EFTA00013437
